docs.snippet: The operator of the ravaged Fukushima Daiichi nuclear plant has left the complex cleanup to a poorly trained work force that has made some dangerous missteps....
docs.lead_paragraph: The operator of the ravaged Fukushima Daiichi nuclear plant has left the complex cleanup to a poorly trained work force that has made some dangerous missteps.
docs.abstract: Cleanup of the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear power plant has been left to a badly managed, poorly trained and destitute work force that has made some dangerous missteps; Tokoyo Electric Power Company, which operates plant, has turned its resources elsewhere, attracting criticism; insiders say deteriorating labor conditions have caused a string of contaminated water leaks and other serious errors.

headline.main: Unskilled and Destitute Are Hiring Targets for Fukushima Cleanup
headline.print_headline: Fukushima Cleaned Up by Poor and Unskilled

docs.snippet: With more people seeing law enforcement's war on drugs as a failure, what are the best, or boldest, ways to deal with the problem?...
docs.abstract: With more people seeing law enforcement's war on drugs as a failure, what are the best, or boldest, ways to deal with the problem?

headline.main: Lowering the Deadly Cost of Drug Abuse
